#summary How to to install the addons using the RooBot central repository

===Mark the (Christian Tzolov) signature trusted===
This is necessary if you are to install addons singed with this signature
{{{
roo> pgp trust --keyId 0xACB27429
}}}

===List all available addons registered in RooBot ===
{{{
roo> addon list
}}}

Amongst others you should see the jaxb, httprepresentations, executable.war and the servletproxy addons. 

===Install an addon from the RooBot repository ===

{{{
addon install --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon
addon install --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.httprepresentations.roo.addon
addon install --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon
addon install --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.http.servletproxy.roo.addon
}}}

Then if you perform 'osgi ps' you should seed the following entries in the outpu:
{{{
...
[  75] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon (1.1.4)
[  76] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.httprepresentations.roo.addon (1.1.4)
[  77] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon (0.1.2)
[  78] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.http.servletproxy.roo.addon (0.1.3)
...
}}}
